alert.note: Alert for Dubois (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 2:33PM EDT until May 19 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN DUBOIS COUNTY... At 233 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Dale, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Huntingburg, Ferdinand, Holland, Saint Marks, Huntingburg Airport, Saint Anthony, Bretzville, Mentor, Saint Henry and Johnsburg. HAIL...1.75IN WIND...70MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
